title: Country-Style Apartment Stay amid Tuscany’s Rolling Hills with Daily Breakfast and Wine & Olive Tasting
description: Embrace the laid-back lifestyle of the Tuscan countryside with a stay at Agriturismo La Sovana, a peaceful country estate surrounded by rolling hills and vineyards, just an hour’s drive from Siena. Surrender to the Italian ‘Dolce Vita’ and enjoy a welcome drink on arrival, delicious daily breakfast, an exclusive wine and olive oil tasting and a complimentary bottle of wine.
